psamplers 0.1.2
  • Reference

Check for efficient proposals if necessary

Source: R/helpers.R
check_efficient.Rd

Takes a mix ratio vector (3 x float) and the efficient proposal mu and sigma If efficient proposals are to be used (mix_ratio[3] > 0) then test the efficient proposal values to see whether they are not null and appropriate.

check_efficient(mix_ratio, efficient_mu, efficient_sig2)

Arguments

mix_ratio

A vector of floats betwen 0 and 1 and summing to 1 which give the ratio of particles to generate from the population level parameters, the individual random effects and the conditional parameters repectively
efficient_mu

The mu value for the efficient proposals
efficient_sig2

The sigma value for the efficient proposals

Value

nothing, stops operation on incorrect combiation of parameters.

Examples

psamplers:::check_efficient(c(0.1, 0.9, 0.0), NULL, NULL)
